please fidn the details guidelines and Generate the following details seo: (

"Slug": Max 75 start with focus keyword

"image seo details": like alt, caption, name.

"Seo Tips" : provide some information for seo optimization
).

in above seo details like "seo Title,focus keyword, seo meta description, slug,tags,seo tips,image seo details " should be at top and then start with "Title", "Introduction, facts , nutrients in tabular format, all all details ,Conclusion, FAQ".
